text: Lyudmila Ivanovna Ivanova (Russian: Людмила Ивановна Иванова; 22 June 1933 – 7 October 2016) was a Soviet and Russian film and stage actress, People's Artist of the RSFSR (1989). She was awarded the Order of Honour and the Order of Friendship. She composed many songs for the guitar. Category:1933 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian stage actors Category:Soviet movie actors
title: Lyudmila Ivanova
